title: Flower Bowl, "Rock crystal style", 1923–24
provenance: This was one of the centerpieces of the 1925 Exposition des Arts Decoratifs et Industriels in Paris; Museum purchase through gift of Dale and Doug Anderson, Anonymous Donor, Arthur Liu, and Prairie Pictures, Inc. and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Dale and Doug Anderson, Anonymous Donor, Arthur Liu, and Prairie Pictures, Inc. and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Blown, cut glass bowl in a style meant to imitate rock crystal.

participants.person_name: J. & L. Lobmeyr GmbH, Vienna, Austria

exhibitions.title: Ted Muehling Selects: Lobmeyr Glass from the Permanent Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Flower Bowl, "Rock crystal style", 1923–24.
1923–24. Glass. Museum purchase through gift of Dale and Doug Anderson, Anonymous Donor, Arthur Liu, and Prairie Pictures, Inc. and from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 2009-18-65.
